documentationPage.title: Documentation
documentationPage.subtitle: Comprehensive guides and technical documentation for the CyberEco digital ecosystem
documentationPage.introductionText: Welcome to CyberEco documentation! This guide will help you get started with our digital ecosystem. CyberEco offers a suite of digital solutions designed to enhance financial collaboration, community engagement, and social connectivity, all within a human-centered framework for conscious, connected, and sustainable living.
documentationPage.step1Desc: Sign up for a CyberEco Hub account to access all applications with a single identity.
documentationPage.step2Desc: Start with JustSplit for expense sharing, then discover our growing ecosystem.
documentationPage.step3Desc: Connect with other users and contribute to our human-centered technology vision.
documentationPage.keyConceptsSubtitle: Understanding the core principles and architecture of CyberEco
documentationPage.digitalSovereigntyConceptText: At the core of CyberEco is the principle of digital sovereignty - the idea that individuals should own and control their digital identity and data. Our architecture ensures that:
documentationPage.digitalSovereigntyPoint1: Users maintain ownership of their personal data
documentationPage.digitalSovereigntyPoint2: Applications are designed to be interoperable and user-controlled
documentationPage.digitalSovereigntyPoint3: No single entity has monopolistic control over user information
documentationPage.digitalSovereigntyPoint4: Privacy is built into the core design, not added as an afterthought
documentationPage.ecosystemArchitectureText: CyberEco is built as a modular ecosystem where each application serves a specific purpose while contributing to the greater whole:
documentationPage.architecturePoint1: Hub: Central authentication and identity management
documentationPage.architecturePoint2: Application Layer: Specialized apps for different life domains
documentationPage.architecturePoint3: Data Layer: User-controlled data storage and sharing
documentationPage.architecturePoint4: Integration Layer: APIs and protocols for seamless interaction
documentationPage.humanCenteredDesignText: Every application in the CyberEco ecosystem is designed with human well-being and authentic connection at its center. This means:
documentationPage.humanCenteredPoint3: Supporting individual growth and community building
documentationPage.humanCenteredPoint4: Respecting human attention and mental health
documentationPage.communityDrivenText: Our development process is guided by actual community needs rather than profit maximization. We prioritize:
documentationPage.communityDrivenPoint2: Community feedback and involvement in feature development
documentationPage.communityDrivenPoint4: Sustainable business models that align with user interests
documentationPage.dataPrivacySubtitle: Comprehensive data protection and privacy controls
documentationPage.privacyOverviewText: CyberEco is built with privacy at its core. Every feature is designed to protect user data and give individuals complete control over their information.
documentationPage.philosophyDocSubtitle: Human-centered technology principles guiding the CyberEco ecosystem
documentationPage.corePhilosophyText: CyberEco is built on the fundamental belief that technology should serve humanity, not the other way around. Our philosophy guides every decision we make.
documentationPage.visionDocSubtitle: The future of decentralized digital living
documentationPage.futureVisionText: We envision a world where digital technology empowers individuals and communities to thrive autonomously, free from corporate surveillance and control.

vision.title: Decentralized Future Vision
vision.subtitle: Transitioning from centralized cloud infrastructure to a distributed, privacy-first, blockchain-based ecosystem

executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.description: CyberEco envisions a future where digital infrastructures empower individuals and communities rather than centralizing control. Our vision extends beyond current limitations to create a truly decentralized ecosystem where users own their data, identity, and digital relationships.

architecture.title: Decentralized Architecture Vision

documentationPage.dataArchitectureDesc: How we structure and protect your data
documentationPage.privacyPrinciple1: Data minimization - we only collect what's necessary
documentationPage.privacyPrinciple2: Purpose limitation - data is used only for stated purposes
documentationPage.privacyPrinciple3: User control - you decide how your data is used
documentationPage.privacyPrinciple4: Transparency - clear information about data practices

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: CyberEco uses JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for secure authentication across all applications. This modern approach provides better security, scalability, and features compared to traditional session-based authentication.

features.title: Key Features
features.secure: Secure token generation with HS256 algorithm
features.shortLived: Short-lived access tokens (1 hour) with refresh tokens (7 days)
features.crossApp: Cross-application authentication with shared audience claims
features.secureCookie: Secure cookie management with HttpOnly and SameSite flags

structure.title: Token Structure
structure.description: JWT tokens consist of three parts: header, payload, and signature. Here's what our tokens contain:

step1.title: Initial Login
step1.description: User logs in with Firebase Auth credentials

step2.title: Token Generation
step2.description: Server generates JWT access and refresh tokens

step4.title: Cross-App Navigation
step4.description: Tokens used for seamless SSO between applications

step5.title: Token Refresh
step5.description: Automatic refresh when access token expires

storage.title: Token Storage
storage.never: Never store in localStorage for production

migration.title: Migration Guide
migration.description: If you're migrating from the old token system to JWT:

sso.title: Single Sign-On (SSO) Integration
sso.subtitle: Seamless authentication across all CyberEco applications

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: CyberEco's Single Sign-On (SSO) system allows users to authenticate once through the Hub and seamlessly access all ecosystem applications without re-entering credentials.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.seamless: Seamless user experience across all applications

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: The SSO system is built on these key components:

hub.title: CyberEco Hub
hub.description: Central authentication provider that manages user sessions and issues JWT tokens for other applications.

jwt.title: JWT Tokens
jwt.description: Secure tokens containing user identity and permissions, valid across all ecosystem applications.

shared.title: Shared Auth State
shared.description: Cross-app authentication state management for seamless navigation between applications.

firebase.title: Firebase Auth
firebase.description: Underlying authentication service providing secure user management and multiple auth providers.

security.title: Security Best Practices
security.https: Always use HTTPS for token transmission
security.rotation: Implement token rotation for long-lived sessions
security.validation: Validate tokens on every protected endpoint

ux.title: User Experience
ux.loading: Show loading states during SSO transitions
ux.errors: Provide clear error messages for auth failures
ux.logout: Implement global logout across all apps

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.compression: Use token compression for large payloads
performance.cdn: Leverage CDN for static authentication assets

step1.title: User Login
step1.description: User authenticates at the Hub using email/password or social providers

step2.title: Token Generation
step2.description: Hub generates JWT access and refresh tokens with user permissions

step3.title: App Navigation
step3.description: User navigates to another app (e.g., JustSplit) with auth token

step4.title: Token Verification
step4.description: Target app verifies token and creates local session

development.title: Development Setup
development.description: For local development, SSO works through shared authentication state:
development.emulator: Firebase Auth emulator enabled at localhost:9099
development.localStorage: Shared auth state via localStorage for cross-app communication
development.gateway: Gateway on port 3000 for unified access

production.title: Production Setup
production.description: Production SSO uses secure cookies and domain configuration:

troubleshooting.title: Common Issues
troubleshooting.description: Most SSO issues are related to configuration mismatches between environments.

crossOrigin.title: Cross-Origin Authentication Failed
crossOrigin.solution: Ensure CORS is properly configured and cookies have correct domain settings.

tokenExpired.title: Token Expired During Navigation
tokenExpired.solution: Implement automatic token refresh before navigation to other apps.

sessionSync.title: Sessions Not Syncing
sessionSync.solution: Check that all apps are using the same auth domain and cookie settings.

privacy.title: Privacy Controls & GDPR Compliance
privacy.subtitle: Comprehensive privacy features that put you in control of your data

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: CyberEco implements a comprehensive privacy-first architecture that ensures users maintain complete control over their personal data. Our privacy controls are built into every layer of the platform, from data collection to processing and sharing.

granularConsent.title: Granular Consent
granularConsent.description: Control exactly how your data is used with purpose-specific consent options

visibilityControls.title: Visibility Controls
visibilityControls.description: Decide who can see your data with profile and activity-level privacy settings

dataAnonymization.title: Data Anonymization
dataAnonymization.description: Automatic anonymization protects your identity based on privacy preferences

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdprCompliance.description: Full compliance with data protection regulations including right to erasure

types.title: Consent Types
types.description: CyberEco uses a granular consent system with five distinct categories:

banner.title: Consent Banner
banner.description: New users are presented with a consent banner that clearly explains data usage:
banner.feature1: Clear explanation of each consent type

profileVisibility.title: Profile Visibility
profileVisibility.description: Control who can see your profile information:
profileVisibility.friendsDesc: Only approved connections can see your profile
profileVisibility.privateDesc: Profile is hidden from all users

activityVisibility.title: Activity Visibility
activityVisibility.description: Fine-grained control over different types of activities:

queries.title: Privacy-Aware Queries
queries.description: All data queries automatically respect privacy settings:

anonymization.title: Data Anonymization
anonymization.description: Personal information is automatically anonymized based on privacy settings:

auditLogging.title: Audit Logging
auditLogging.description: All data access is logged for security and compliance:

rightToAccess.title: Right to Access
rightToAccess.description: Users can request and download all their personal data:

rightToErasure.title: Right to Erasure
rightToErasure.description: Users can request complete deletion of their personal data:
rightToErasure.step2: Request is logged with timestamp and reason
rightToErasure.step3: Grace period for user to reconsider (configurable)

rightToRectification.title: Right to Rectification
rightToRectification.description: Users can update their personal information at any time through the profile settings.

privacyService.title: Privacy Service Methods
privacyService.canViewData: Check if viewer can access data

dataExport.title: Data Export & Portability
dataExport.description: Export your CyberEco data in multiple formats for backup, analysis, or migration

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: CyberEco provides comprehensive data export functionality that allows users to download all their personal data in machine-readable formats. This feature supports data portability rights under GDPR and gives users full control over their information.

json.title: JSON Export
json.description: Structured data format ideal for developers and data analysis

csv.title: CSV Export
csv.description: Spreadsheet-compatible format for easy viewing and analysis

instantDownload.title: Instant Download
instantDownload.description: Get your data immediately with secure, authenticated access

completeData.title: Complete Data
completeData.description: Export all your data including metadata and relationships

included.title: What's Included
included.profileInfoDesc: Name, email, avatar, account creation date

steps.step4: Choose your preferred format (JSON or CSV)

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.machineReadableDesc: JSON and CSV formats ensure data can be easily processed
gdpr.commonlyUsedDesc: Standard formats compatible with most applications
gdpr.directTransferDesc: API support for direct transfer to other services
gdpr.completeDataSetDesc: All personal data provided by the user included

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your CyberEco account with TOTP-based authentication

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) provides an additional security layer beyond just a password. CyberEco implements Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) authentication, compatible with popular authenticator apps like Google Authenticator, Authy, and Microsoft Authenticator.

mobile.title: Mobile Authentication
mobile.description: Use your smartphone as a second factor with any TOTP-compatible app

easySetup.title: Easy Setup
easySetup.description: Quick QR code scanning for seamless authenticator app configuration

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: Recovery codes ensure you're never locked out of your account

enhanced.title: Enhanced Security
enhanced.description: Protect against password theft and unauthorized access attempts

step1.title: Step 1: Enable 2FA
step1.item1: Navigate to Hub ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Two-Factor Authentication

step2.title: Step 2: Configure Authenticator App
step2.scanQR: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app or manually enter the secret key:

step3.title: Step 3: Verify Setup
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup.

step4.title: Step 4: Save Backup Codes
step4.description: Save your backup codes in a secure location. Each code can only be used once.

algorithm.title: TOTP Algorithm
algorithm.description: CyberEco uses the Time-based One-Time Password algorithm (RFC 6238) with these parameters:

what.title: What Are Backup Codes?
what.description: Backup codes are single-use codes that can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator device. Each code can only be used once.

features.singleUseDesc: each code becomes invalid after use

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.item1: Store codes in a secure password manager
bestPractices.item2: Print codes and store in a safe location
bestPractices.item3: Never share backup codes with anyone
bestPractices.item4: Regenerate codes if any are compromised

invalidCode.title: Invalid Code Error
invalidCode.item1: Verify your device time is synchronized
invalidCode.item2: Check timezone settings on both device and server
invalidCode.item3: Ensure code is entered within 30-second window

lostDevice.title: Lost Authenticator Device
lostDevice.step1: Use a backup code to sign in

qrCode.title: QR Code Not Scanning
qrCode.item2: Try manual entry with the secret key
qrCode.item3: Update authenticator app to latest version

security.title: Security Considerations
security.item1: Never share your 2FA secret or backup codes
security.item2: Use different 2FA secrets for different services
security.item4: Enable 2FA on your email account as well

authLogging.title: Authentication Logging & Monitoring
authLogging.subtitle: Comprehensive logging and monitoring for authentication events, security auditing, and user behavior analysis

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: CyberEco's authentication system includes comprehensive logging and monitoring capabilities to track authentication events, detect security issues, and analyze user behavior across the ecosystem.

features.title: Key Features
features.realtime: Real-time event logging for all authentication activities
features.structured: Structured logging with consistent event types

dashboard.title: Monitoring Dashboard
dashboard.description: The Hub provides an authentication monitoring dashboard for administrators at /auth-logs.

filtering.title: Log Filtering
filtering.description: Filter by level, user, or event type

export.title: Export Logs
export.description: Download logs as JSON for analysis

session.title: Missing Session IDs
session.solution: Ensure logger is initialized early in app lifecycle

memory.title: Memory Usage
memory.solution: Implement log rotation for long-running sessions

overview.title: Unified Authentication System
overview.description: CyberEco's authentication system provides a single sign-on experience across all applications, with centralized user management, permission control, and secure session handling.

sso.title: Single Sign-On
sso.description: One account for all CyberEco applications. Sign in once, access everything.

profiles.title: Centralized Profiles
profiles.description: User profiles managed in Hub, accessible across all connected applications.

permissions.title: Permission Control
permissions.description: Fine-grained permissions for app access, features, and resource-level control.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.benefit3: Enhanced security with centralized access control

flow.title: Authentication Flow
flow.step5: Redirect back to app with token

overview.title: Overview
overview.description1: The CyberEco ecosystem is designed as a comprehensive digital lifestyle platform that empowers users with sovereignty over their digital lives. Our suite of applications covers essential life domains - from financial management and community governance to sustainable living and personal growth.
overview.description2: Each application is built with privacy-first principles, seamless integration, and human-centered design at its core. Together, they form an interconnected ecosystem where data flows securely between applications while remaining under user control.

currentApps.title: Current Applications
currentApps.description: These applications are live and ready to use today, forming the foundation of the CyberEco ecosystem.

priorityApps.title: Priority Applications (2025-2026)
priorityApps.description: Our next wave of applications focuses on community building, cultural heritage, and sustainable living. These are currently under active development.

solutionCategories.title: Solution Categories
solutionCategories.description: Our applications are organized into focused categories, each addressing specific aspects of modern digital life.

futureEcosystem.title: Future Ecosystem (2026+)
futureEcosystem.description: Our vision extends to over 30+ specialized applications, each designed to work seamlessly within the CyberEco ecosystem while respecting user privacy and data sovereignty.

modularArchitecture.title: Modular Architecture
modularArchitecture.description: Each app can function independently while benefiting from ecosystem integration

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: Data flows securely between apps with user consent and control

privacyByDesign.title: Privacy by Design
privacyByDesign.description: Every application follows strict privacy principles and GDPR compliance

userCentricDesign.description: Every feature is designed with real user needs in mind, avoiding dark patterns and addictive mechanisms

documentationPage.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about CyberEco
documentationPage.faqIntro: Browse through our frequently asked questions to find quick answers about CyberEco, our applications, and how to get started.
documentationPage.whatIsCyberEcoAnswer: CyberEco is a human-centered digital ecosystem that provides a suite of applications for financial collaboration, community engagement, and sustainable living. Our platform prioritizes user privacy, digital sovereignty, and authentic human connections.
documentationPage.howMuchCostAnswer: CyberEco offers a freemium model. Basic features are free for all users, while advanced features and increased storage are available through affordable subscriptions. We believe in sustainable pricing that provides value without exploitation.

overview.title: Privacy-First Architecture
overview.description: CyberEco is built with privacy at its core. Every feature is designed to protect user data and give individuals complete control over their information.
overview.gdprCompliant: Full GDPR compliance with user consent management
overview.dataMinimization: Data minimization - only collect what's necessary
overview.userControl: Complete user control over personal data
overview.portability: Data portability with standard export formats
overview.rightToDelete: Right to deletion - permanent data removal

sovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: You own your data. We're just custodians providing a service.

minimization.title: Data Minimization
minimization.description: We only collect data that's absolutely necessary for the service.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear information about what data we collect and how it's used.

purpose.title: Purpose Limitation
purpose.description: Data is only used for its stated purpose, nothing more.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: CyberEco is fully compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), ensuring the highest standards of data protection for all users.

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: Correct any inaccurate personal data we have about you.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data (right to be forgotten).

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

restrict.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restrict.description: Limit how we process your personal data.

object.title: Right to Object
object.description: Object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes.

controls.title: Privacy Controls
controls.description: Granular controls that put users in charge of their data and privacy settings.

visibility.title: Data Visibility Controls
visibility.privateDesc: Only you can see this data

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Multiple layers of security protect your data at rest and in transit.

implementation.title: Implementation Guide
implementation.description: How to implement privacy features in your CyberEco applications.

documentationPage.dataPrivacyAnswer: We implement privacy-by-design principles. You own your data, control who sees it, and can export or delete it at any time. We never sell user data and comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations. All data queries respect your privacy settings automatically.
documentationPage.ssoAnswer: With CyberEco Hub, you create one account that works across all our applications. Sign in once and seamlessly navigate between JustSplit, Somos, and other apps without re-entering credentials. Your authentication state is securely synchronized across all ecosystem applications.
documentationPage.twoFactorQuestion: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
documentationPage.twoFactorAnswer: Enable 2FA in your Hub security settings. We support TOTP-based authentication compatible with apps like Google Authenticator and Authy. Once enabled, you'll need both your password and a time-based code to access your account.
documentationPage.forgotPasswordQuestion: What if I forget my password?
documentationPage.forgotPasswordAnswer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the sign-in page to receive a password reset link via email. For security, reset links expire after 1 hour. If you have 2FA enabled, you may need to verify your identity through additional steps.
documentationPage.apiAccessQuestion: Can I access CyberEco data through an API?
documentationPage.apiAccessAnswer: Yes! We provide comprehensive REST APIs for all our services. Developers can integrate with our authentication system, access user-permitted data, and build on top of our platform. Check our API documentation for detailed endpoints and examples.
documentationPage.supportedBrowsersAnswer: CyberEco works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend keeping your browser updated for the best experience and security. Mobile browsers are fully supported for on-the-go access.
documentationPage.offlineAnswer: Some features work offline with automatic sync when you reconnect. However, real-time collaboration features and cross-app navigation require an internet connection. We're working on expanding offline capabilities in future updates.
documentationPage.paymentMethodsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
documentationPage.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. For annual subscriptions, we also support bank transfers in select regions. All payment processing is handled securely through trusted payment providers.
documentationPage.cancelSubscriptionQuestion: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
documentationPage.cancelSubscriptionAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your billing settings. You'll continue to have access to paid features until the end of your current billing period. No hidden fees or penalties for cancellation.
documentationPage.refundAnswer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund. For monthly subscriptions, refunds are prorated based on usage.
documentationPage.stillNeedHelpDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
documentationPage.communitySupportSubtitle: Get help from our vibrant community
documentationPage.joinCommunityText: Connect with other CyberEco users, share experiences, and get help from our growing community of digital pioneers.
documentationPage.githubDesc: Contribute to open-source projects and track development
documentationPage.discordDesc: Real-time chat with community members and developers
documentationPage.emailSupportDesc: Direct support for account and technical issues
documentationPage.contribute1: Report bugs and suggest features on GitHub
documentationPage.contribute3: Share your CyberEco experience and use cases

documentationPage.troubleshootingIntro: Find solutions to frequently encountered problems. If you can't find your issue here, contact our support team.
documentationPage.cantSignInIssue: Can't sign in to my account
documentationPage.checkCredentials: Verify your email and password are correct
documentationPage.enableCookies: Ensure cookies are enabled in your browser
documentationPage.checkDateTime: Check your device date and time settings
documentationPage.expensesNotSyncingSolution: Check internet connection and refresh the page. If persists, sign out and back in.
documentationPage.wrongCalculationsSolution: Verify all participants are included and amounts are entered correctly. Check currency settings.
documentationPage.cantInviteFriendsSolution: Ensure you have the correct email address. Check if they already have a CyberEco account.
documentationPage.ssoNotWorkingSolution: Clear cookies for all CyberEco domains. Ensure you're using the same account across apps.
documentationPage.twoFactorLockedSolution: Use backup codes if available. Contact support with account verification for 2FA reset.
documentationPage.updateBrowser: Update to the latest browser version
documentationPage.reduceDataUsage: Enable data saver mode in settings
documentationPage.clearAppData: Clear browser cache and local storage
documentationPage.closeOtherApps: Close unnecessary browser tabs and applications
documentationPage.reportBug: Report persistent issues to our team
documentationPage.bookmarkHub: Bookmark the Hub for quick access to all apps
documentationPage.usePasswordManager: Use a password manager for secure credentials
documentationPage.joinBeta: Join our beta program to test new features early
documentationPage.emergencySupportDesc: For urgent account issues or security concerns:
documentationPage.firstTimeDesc: Start with key concepts and architecture overview
documentationPage.getStartedDesc: Create your account and explore the ecosystem
documentationPage.buildDesc: Jump into our API docs and start developing
documentationPage.searchHint: Tip: Use Ctrl/Cmd + K to search documentation quickly
documentationPage.demosDesc: A participatory digital democracy platform that enables transparent voting and decision-making for organizations and neighborhoods.
documentationPage.communityManagerDesc: Advanced tools to create, organize, and govern digital or physical communities with ease and transparency.
documentationPage.myCommunityDesc: A platform to discover relevant local resources, events, and initiatives in your environment and strengthen community ties.
documentationPage.conciliationDesc: Resolve conflicts and reach agreements through mediation and structured dialogue.
documentationPage.justSplitAboutText: The smart expense sharing app that makes splitting costs simple, fair, and transparent.
documentationPage.myWealthDesc: Comprehensive personal finance management with investment tracking and wealth building tools.
documentationPage.myBusinessDesc: Complete business management suite for entrepreneurs and small businesses.
documentationPage.plantopiaAboutText: Smart gardening assistant that helps you grow healthy plants with personalized care recommendations.
documentationPage.ecoTulDesc: Track and reduce your environmental footprint with actionable sustainability insights.
documentationPage.myHomeDesc: Smart home management platform for maintenance, utilities, and household organization.
documentationPage.educationHubDesc: Personalized learning platform with courses, certifications, and skill development paths.
documentationPage.skillShareDesc: Community-driven platform for sharing knowledge and learning new skills from peers.
documentationPage.habitsDesc: Build positive habits and break negative ones with science-based tracking and support.
documentationPage.oneStepDesc: Personal development companion for setting and achieving life goals.
documentationPage.apiOverviewText: The CyberEco API provides programmatic access to all platform features and data.
documentationPage.apiAuthText: All API requests require authentication using JWT tokens obtained from the Hub.
documentationPage.apiRequestsText: Send HTTP requests to API endpoints with proper headers and authentication.
documentationPage.gettingStartedGuidesText: Step-by-step tutorials for new users to get up and running quickly.
documentationPage.faq1Answer: CyberEco is a comprehensive digital ecosystem designed to enhance various aspects of modern life through interconnected applications.
documentationPage.faq2Answer: Yes, CyberEco offers a generous free tier with core features. Premium features are available through affordable subscriptions.
documentationPage.faq3Answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security practices. You own your data and can export or delete it anytime.
documentationPage.faq4Answer: Create groups, add expenses, and JustSplit automatically calculates who owes what with smart splitting algorithms.
documentationPage.faq5Answer: Yes, JustSplit supports multiple currencies with automatic conversion for international groups.
documentationPage.faq6Answer: Mark settlements when payments are made. JustSplit tracks the history and updates balances automatically.
documentationPage.loginIssuesSymptoms: Login fails, password reset not working, 2FA problems
documentationPage.passwordResetStep: Try password reset from login page
documentationPage.dataIssuesSymptoms: Expenses disappeared, amounts wrong, participants missing
documentationPage.forceSyncStep: Force sync by pulling down on expense list
documentationPage.checkDraftsStep: Check Profile ‚Üí Drafts for unsaved expenses
documentationPage.contactDataRecoveryStep: Email data-recovery@cybere.co if data truly lost
documentationPage.performanceSymptoms: Slow loading, crashes, freezing, high battery usage
documentationPage.notificationSymptoms: Not receiving expense notifications, reminders, or updates
documentationPage.checkNotificationSettingsStep: Check notification settings in app and device
documentationPage.logoutAllStep: Log out all devices in Settings ‚Üí Security
documentationPage.directSupportDesc: Email support@cybere.co for personalized help with your specific issue.
documentationPage.communityHelpDesc: Get help from other users in our forums and Discord community.
documentationPage.fullGuideDesc: Access our comprehensive troubleshooting documentation with detailed solutions.
documentationPage.communityVisionText: CyberEco is more than a platform‚Äîit's a community of people who believe technology should serve human flourishing. We organize around principles of digital sovereignty, human-centered design, and sustainable growth.
documentationPage.communityForumsFullDesc: Primary platform for discussion, feature requests, and community voting. All major decisions start here.
documentationPage.discordServerDesc: Real-time chat, technical help, and social events. Connect with other users and the development team.
documentationPage.localGroupsDesc: In-person meetups in major cities for user training, feedback sessions, and social events.
documentationPage.governanceText: Our community is guided by a representative Community Council and specialized Working Groups that shape platform development and policies.
documentationPage.communityCouncilDesc: 9 members: 6 user representatives, 2 developers, 1 founder. Guides major decisions and policy.
documentationPage.workingGroupsDesc: Specialized teams focusing on features, privacy, outreach, and design. Open to community participation.
documentationPage.learningSessionsDesc: Interactive workshops on digital privacy, sustainable technology, and community organizing.
documentationPage.coffeeChatsDesc: Informal community building in small groups across multiple time zones.
documentationPage.hackathonsDesc: Community-driven feature development with mentorship and implementation opportunities.
documentationPage.prerequisitesText: Required tools and software for CyberEco development.
documentationPage.setupDoneText: Your development environment is now running on:
documentationPage.monorepoStructureText: CyberEco uses NX monorepo architecture for shared code and optimized builds.
documentationPage.buildStack: Build System: NX Monorepo with computation caching
documentationPage.testingStack: Testing: Jest with React Testing Library
documentationPage.uiComponentsDesc: Reusable React components with CSS Modules
documentationPage.sharedAssetsDesc: Common assets including logos and brand materials
documentationPage.sharedComponentsIntro: CyberEco implements a robust shared component architecture that ensures consistency across all applications while maintaining flexibility for app-specific needs.
documentationPage.navigationDesc: Configurable navigation bar with mobile support, theme/language switching, and customizable links and action buttons.
documentationPage.userMenuDesc: Dropdown user menu with avatar support, configurable menu items, and responsive design for mobile devices.
documentationPage.footerDesc: Flexible footer component with customizable sections, social links, and company information.
documentationPage.configDropdownDesc: Theme and language switcher with persistent settings and smooth transitions.
documentationPage.modalDesc: Accessible modal component with portal rendering, focus management, keyboard navigation, and customizable sizes.
documentationPage.toastDesc: Full-featured notification system with position control, auto-dismiss, action buttons, and imperative API.
documentationPage.appLayoutDesc: Consistent layout wrapper that combines header, footer, and main content with proper spacing and responsive design.
documentationPage.globalProviderDesc: Unified context provider for theme and language settings across applications.
documentationPage.designPrinciple1: Consistent user experience across all applications
documentationPage.designPrinciple3: Dark/light theme support with smooth transitions
documentationPage.testInfrastructureDesc: Each shared component includes comprehensive test coverage with Jest and React Testing Library. The testing infrastructure includes:
documentationPage.testFeature1: Unit tests for component behavior and rendering
documentationPage.testFeature4: Mock utilities for consistent testing patterns
documentationPage.testFeature5: Portal rendering tests for Modal and Toast components
documentationPage.testFeature6: 90%+ test coverage across all shared components
documentationPage.hubGatewayOverviewText: The Hub serves as both the authentication center and intelligent proxy for the entire CyberEco ecosystem. It provides seamless access to all applications through a single entry point, eliminating the need for multiple logins and separate application URLs.
documentationPage.ssoFeatureDesc: Authenticate once and seamlessly access all CyberEco applications without additional logins.
documentationPage.proxyFeatureDesc: Smart routing that automatically directs requests to the appropriate application while maintaining authentication state.
documentationPage.discoveryFeatureDesc: Beautiful landing page showcasing all available applications with real-time status indicators.
documentationPage.securityFeatureDesc: Centralized security headers, CORS handling, and request filtering for all proxied applications.
documentationPage.appAccessText: Access CyberEco applications through the Hub launcher with seamless authentication:
documentationPage.middlewareArchitectureText: The Hub uses Next.js middleware to intelligently route requests:
documentationPage.lanAccessText: Access your CyberEco Hub from any device on your local network:
documentationPage.lanStep2Desc: Use your computer's hostname or IP address:
documentationPage.productionDeploymentText: The Hub is configured for Firebase hosting with dynamic routing:
documentationPage.completeHubGatewayDesc: Explore advanced proxy features, security configurations, and deployment strategies.

justSplitGuide.title: JustSplit User Guide
justSplitGuide.introText: JustSplit is CyberEco's flagship expense-sharing application that makes splitting costs with friends, family, and groups simple and fair. This comprehensive guide will walk you through everything from basic expense tracking to advanced settlement strategies.
justSplitGuide.whyJustSplitText: Whether you're sharing dinner bills, planning group trips, managing household expenses, or organizing events, JustSplit eliminates the awkwardness and complexity of money conversations. Our transparent calculations and automatic balance tracking ensure everyone pays their fair share.
justSplitGuide.feature1Desc: Automatically calculate who owes what with multiple splitting options
justSplitGuide.feature2Desc: Organize expenses by groups for roommates, trips, events, and more
justSplitGuide.feature3Desc: Handle expenses in different currencies with real-time conversion
justSplitGuide.feature4Desc: Keep track of payments and settle up with one-click solutions
justSplitGuide.feature5Desc: Capture and attach receipts to expenses for complete records
justSplitGuide.feature6Desc: Categorize spending for better insights and organization
justSplitGuide.step1Title: Sign In with Your CyberEco Account
justSplitGuide.step1Text: Access JustSplit using your CyberEco Hub account. If you don't have one yet, create your account first.
justSplitGuide.step2Text: Add your preferred payment methods and default currency. This information helps when settling up with friends.
justSplitGuide.profileTip1: Upload a profile photo to help friends identify you
justSplitGuide.profileTip2: Add multiple payment methods (Venmo, PayPal, bank transfer)
justSplitGuide.profileTip3: Set your home currency for automatic conversions
justSplitGuide.step3Title: Create or Join Your First Group
justSplitGuide.step3Text: Groups are the heart of JustSplit. Create groups for different contexts like household expenses, trips, or regular outings.
justSplitGuide.groupsIntro: Groups in JustSplit help you organize expenses and track balances with specific sets of people. Each group maintains its own balance sheet and expense history.
justSplitGuide.householdDesc: Track rent, utilities, groceries, and shared household items
justSplitGuide.tripDesc: Manage travel expenses including hotels, transportation, and activities
justSplitGuide.socialDesc: Split restaurant bills, movie tickets, and entertainment costs
justSplitGuide.projectDesc: Organize expenses for events, parties, or collaborative projects
justSplitGuide.groupNameExample: Examples: 'Beach House 2024', 'Monthly Game Night', 'Smith Family Reunion'
justSplitGuide.groupIconDesc: Pick an icon that represents your group's purpose
justSplitGuide.groupCurrencyDesc: Choose the primary currency for this group's expenses
justSplitGuide.groupMembersDesc: Invite friends via email or CyberEco username
justSplitGuide.simplifyDebtsDesc: Automatically optimize who pays whom to minimize transactions
justSplitGuide.splitDefaultDesc: Set how expenses are split by default (equal, by percentage, custom)
justSplitGuide.notificationsDesc: Choose when members receive updates about new expenses
justSplitGuide.quickAddDesc: For simple expenses, use the quick add button:
justSplitGuide.quickAddStep4: Choose how to split (equal by default)
justSplitGuide.detailedExpenseDesc: For more complex expenses, use the detailed form:
justSplitGuide.expensePayerDesc: The person who covered the expense
justSplitGuide.equalSplitDesc: Divide the total equally among all participants
justSplitGuide.exactAmountsDesc: Specify exactly what each person owes
justSplitGuide.percentageExample: Example: Host pays 40%, guests split remaining 60%
justSplitGuide.sharesExample: Example: Couple gets 2 shares, single person gets 1 share
justSplitGuide.adjustmentDesc: Add or subtract amounts for specific people
justSplitGuide.adjustmentExample: Example: Everyone splits equally, but Tim had extra drinks (+$15)
justSplitGuide.recurringExpensesDesc: Set up automatic expense entries for regular payments like rent or subscriptions:
justSplitGuide.recurringStep4: Choose end date or number of occurrences
justSplitGuide.expenseTemplatesDesc: Save common expense patterns for quick reuse:
justSplitGuide.itemizedBillsDesc: Perfect for restaurant bills where people ordered different items:
justSplitGuide.currencyDesc: JustSplit automatically handles currency conversion for international groups:
justSplitGuide.currencyFeature3: Set preferred display currency per user
justSplitGuide.balanceExplanation: JustSplit continuously tracks who owes whom within each group. Your balance shows your net position:
justSplitGuide.totalBalanceDesc: Your overall position in the group
justSplitGuide.individualBalanceDesc: Detailed breakdown of what you owe or are owed by each person
justSplitGuide.balanceHistoryDesc: Track how balances changed over time
justSplitGuide.paymentAppsDesc: Venmo, PayPal, Zelle, and other services
justSplitGuide.nonMonetaryDesc: Settle through goods, services, or future expenses
justSplitGuide.settlementStep1Desc: Check who you owe and who owes you
justSplitGuide.settlementStep2Desc: Select how you want to settle up
justSplitGuide.settlementStep3Desc: Enter the amount and confirm with the other party
justSplitGuide.settlementStep4Desc: Both parties confirm the payment was completed
justSplitGuide.debtSimplificationDesc: JustSplit optimizes payments to minimize the number of transactions needed
justSplitGuide.groupSettlementDesc: Settle all balances in a group with optimized payment suggestions
justSplitGuide.partialSettlementDesc: Pay part of what you owe when full payment isn't possible
justSplitGuide.categoryBreakdownDesc: See where money is being spent
justSplitGuide.memberContributionsDesc: Analyze who pays for what most often
justSplitGuide.csvExportDesc: Download expense data for spreadsheet analysis
justSplitGuide.taxReportDesc: Export business-related expenses for tax purposes
justSplitGuide.tip1Desc: Enter expenses soon after they occur to maintain accuracy
justSplitGuide.tip2Desc: Clear descriptions help everyone remember what expenses were for
justSplitGuide.tip3Desc: Photo evidence prevents disputes and aids record-keeping
justSplitGuide.tip4Desc: Use comments to clarify unusual expenses or splitting decisions
justSplitGuide.tip5Desc: Don't let balances accumulate too long - settle monthly or after trips
justSplitGuide.tip6Desc: Ensure notification and splitting preferences match group needs
justSplitGuide.scenario1Solution: Create a household group, add recurring expenses for rent/utilities, use equal splitting for shared items
justSplitGuide.scenario2Solution: Set up a trip group, use multi-currency support, settle up at the end of the trip
justSplitGuide.scenario3Solution: Create templates for favorite restaurants, rotate who pays, let JustSplit track the balance
justSplitGuide.scenario4Solution: Track all event expenses, use percentage splitting for different contribution levels
justSplitGuide.issue1Solution: Check if you're viewing the correct group and date range
justSplitGuide.issue2Solution: Review recent expenses and settlements, check for pending expenses
justSplitGuide.issue3Solution: Ensure they have a CyberEco account and you're using the correct email
justSplitGuide.issue4Solution: Check date settings and ensure exchange rate data is updated
justSplitGuide.advancedGuideDesc: Deep dive into power user features and automation
justSplitGuide.integrationsDesc: Connect JustSplit with your bank and payment apps
justSplitGuide.apiAccessDesc: Build custom integrations and automate expense tracking
justSplitGuide.communityTipsDesc: Learn from other users' strategies and workflows
justSplitGuide.supportText: If you have questions not covered in this guide, our support team and community are here to help.

accountSetupGuide.title: Account Creation & Setup
accountSetupGuide.introText: This guide will walk you through creating your CyberEco Hub account - your single identity for accessing all applications in our ecosystem. We'll cover account creation, security setup, privacy controls, and initial configuration.
accountSetupGuide.privacyFirstText: Your CyberEco account is designed with privacy at its core. You own your data, control what you share, and can export or delete your information anytime.
accountSetupGuide.step1Desc: Navigate to the CyberEco Hub registration page. You can access this from any CyberEco application or directly at hub.cybere.co/signup.
accountSetupGuide.step2Desc: Select a unique username and provide your email address. Your username will be your public identifier across all CyberEco applications.
accountSetupGuide.usernameTip3: You can change it later, but connections may be affected
accountSetupGuide.step3Desc: Your password protects access to all your CyberEco applications. Choose a strong, unique password that you don't use elsewhere.
accountSetupGuide.passReq2: Mix of uppercase and lowercase letters
accountSetupGuide.passReq3: At least one number and special character
accountSetupGuide.passReq4: Not used on any other accounts
accountSetupGuide.step4Desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account. We support authenticator apps, SMS, and hardware keys.
accountSetupGuide.authenticatorDesc: Most secure option using apps like Google Authenticator or Authy
accountSetupGuide.smsDesc: Receive codes via text message to your phone
accountSetupGuide.hardwareDesc: Physical security keys like YubiKey for maximum security
accountSetupGuide.step5Desc: Set your default privacy preferences. You can always adjust these later for specific applications or sharing scenarios.
accountSetupGuide.profileVisibilityDesc: Who can see your basic profile information and activity across applications.
accountSetupGuide.activitySharingDesc: How your activity in applications (like expenses or events) is shared with others.
accountSetupGuide.dataCollectionDesc: What usage data we collect for improving applications (always anonymized).
accountSetupGuide.step6Desc: Check your email for a verification message. Click the verification link to activate your account and enable all features.
accountSetupGuide.verificationText: Some features like password reset and security notifications require a verified email address.
accountSetupGuide.exploreJustSplitDesc: Start sharing expenses with friends and family using our most popular application.
accountSetupGuide.securityDeepDiveDesc: Learn advanced security features and privacy controls for your account.
accountSetupGuide.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with other users and participate in shaping the platform's future.
accountSetupGuide.supportText: If you encounter any issues during setup, our support team is here to help.

learningPaths.title: Learning Paths
learningPaths.subtitle: Structured learning journeys to master the CyberEco ecosystem
learningPaths.chooseYourPathDesc: Each learning path is designed to help you achieve specific goals within the CyberEco ecosystem. Whether you're a developer looking to contribute, a business user seeking efficiency, or a community leader building connections, we have a path for you.

developer.title: Developer Path
developer.description: Learn to build and contribute to the CyberEco ecosystem

businessUser.title: Business User Path
businessUser.description: Master CyberEco tools for your business needs

communityLeader.title: Community Leader Path
communityLeader.description: Lead and grow communities using CyberEco platforms

monorepo.title: Monorepo Structure
monorepo.description: CyberEco uses an NX-powered monorepo architecture that enables code sharing, consistent tooling, and efficient builds across all applications.

digitalSovereignty.title: Digital Sovereignty
digitalSovereignty.description: Users own and control their data with export and portability features

modularArchitecture.title: Modular Architecture
modularArchitecture.description: Independent apps that share common infrastructure and components

privacyByDesign.title: Privacy by Design
privacyByDesign.description: GDPR compliance and privacy controls built into the core

openStandards.title: Open Standards
openStandards.description: Using open protocols and standards for interoperability

integration.title: Integration Patterns
integration.description: Learn how CyberEco applications integrate and communicate with each other.

sso.title: Single Sign-On (SSO)
sso.description: Centralized authentication through the Hub ensures users sign in once and access all applications seamlessly.

sharedData.title: Shared Data Models
sharedData.description: Common TypeScript interfaces and data structures enable consistent data handling across applications.

eventBus.title: Event Bus Architecture
eventBus.description: Applications communicate through a centralized event system for real-time updates and notifications.

apis.title: REST APIs
apis.description: Well-documented REST APIs allow external integrations and cross-application data access.
